attributes.action: Bind the Government into holding the promised Referendum regarding either the European Constitution, or the Treaty which is to replace that same Constitution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present Prime Minister is preparing to sign the United Kingdom to a European Treaty which hands yet more British sovereignty and power over our own country to the European Union, and as such should be resisted at all cost!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EU-treaty-NON/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
